meanings.sent1: The wild horse ran freely, unharnessed and untamed.
meanings.sent2: The kite soared high in the sky, unharnessed by any strings.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy unharnessed chaos in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her unharnessed creativity knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The unharnessed wind whipped through the open fields.

meanings.definition: Not attached to a harness or other restraining device
meanings.sent1: The unharnessed dog happily roamed around the yard.
meanings.sent2: The boat floated freely, unharnessed to the dock.
meanings.sent3: The unharnessed balloon drifted lazily in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: His unharnessed potential was evident in every task he undertook.
meanings.sent5: The unharnessed energy of the children filled the playground with laughter.
